channel.title: [PI]Run Hero[PI]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/9jeq1c.png[/img][/center] [center]By : [shadow=green,left]Bilal[/shadow][/center]
First of i would like to say that Welcome to Run Hero, also this is my first realse so please do not flame if theres something wrong with it, the base is from insidiaX but i have changed loads of things in it for example Ive added upto 100 shops and put NPC's all over the world Ive changed somethings in the dung and i have made Christmas event and loads of more also i have made 3 homes when you click the home button it gives you 3 option of where to go and there are more.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Credits: [shadow=green,left]ME[/shadow] - 55% - Because i have changed alot inside it and added loaded of things. [shadow=red,left]InsidiaX[/shadow] - 45% - Because the base is from there. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center]features: -602 NPC Amount: 11257 -525 graphics -602 Skill Interface -new staffzone -Fading Hitmarks -Christmas event -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering - 8 floors -Summoning Special Attacks -Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -100% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops - by doing ::myshop -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style. -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages.[/center]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PICTURES:
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/k2k1e9.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/27yc39y.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/vfxsg6.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/51ww83.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/339kml4.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2iizrl2.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ildhk4.png[/img][/center]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center][u][i][b]Download Links HERE[/b][/i][/u]:[/center] Source - http://uppit.com/bycg4ezhd186/Run_Hero_source.rar Client - http://www.mediafire.com/?01jpxd27xomhtu5 cache - is inside the client :) so you dont have to do anything with it u just run the server.
any problems please comment.

item.dc:creator: @chaor1996 chaor1996
item.description:
@chaor1996 wrote:

Hi Guys,

It has been so long sense i released this. I haven’t coded in so long and lost most of my source and clients.

by any chance anyone has a copy of this source and client?

love,
bilal

item.title: [PI]Run Hero[PI]
item.dc:creator: @CreativityScape CreativityScape
item.description:
@CreativityScape wrote:

[quote=“Jr Satan, post:2, topic:425406”]downloading looks nice i wanted to ask if it has working easter ring or if you can help me code ill give you co owner :# please relpy back ill let you know of any errors or anything
ps first post
[edit] you messed up the jdk in run server its an easy fix id just like to tell people how to fix
this is how it was “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” it should be like
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" just replace the 1.70_01 with your jdk
[edit again] if you want to know what it looks like b4 you download it i have it up and running not advertsing just helping out its at :http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Pk-4ever[/quote]
:palm:

Read full topic
